images.description: HST image of region near lenticular galaxy NGC 1023 and its apparent companion, PGC 10139 (also called NGC 1023A), which comprise Arp 135

HST image of irregular galaxy PGC 10139 (also called NGC 1023A) and part of its apparent companion, NGC 1023, with which it comprises Arp 135
